summary: HBO Teases Game Of Thrones Season 8 First Look: Are The Starks Reuniting?
title: HBO Teases Game Of Thrones Season 8 First Look: Are The Starks Reuniting?
body:
HBO Teases Game Of Thrones Season 8 First Look: Are The Starks Reuniting?

Credit: HBO

Winter has arrived in Westeros but unfortunately, we still have ways to go until Game of Thrones makes its highly anticipated return to our screens. Thankfully though, HBO has given a small glimpse into what lies ahead for season 8.

On Sunday, the network released a trailer of sorts for all of its upcoming new programming which included a very small sneak peek at the new season.

In…

tags: that scene had romantic written all over it
summary: That scene had “romantic” written all over it ( jonsa scenes)
title: That scene had “romantic” written all over it ( jonsa scenes)
body:
Ok l started this series a few months ago but you know real life…. So this post is not about a particular scene but about  multiple jonsa’ scenes .


In  jonsa’ scenes there is always another scene inside the main scene not just a scene but  a running scene!! in that running scene time always stop for a few seconds, and during those seconds jon and sansa are in their world, world they created for themself since their reunion. Jon and sansa systematically stare deeply and intensely into each other’s eyes  for a considerably long time ….. in a crowded room or a scene full of people all they see  and can’t stop staring at is each other!!! Them looking at each other longingly  shouldn’t be happening since they’re supposed to be in a sister and brothers’ dynamic  but it’s happening because their dynamic isn’t written as such!! In those moments there are a lot of unsaid thoughts and feelings wich create  angsty situations !!

Those moments are full of tension and l love them  because in those moments jon and sansa don’t have to words their thoughts  to let the other know what they are feeling , all they  have to do is to silently stare deeply into each others eyes to convey what their thoughts or feelings are !! and that’s really beautiful because they sort of created their own language, language that only  exist because of the  deep connection they share !!

l already talked about this but damn that reunion was so beautiful  !! it was so powerfull and that instant connetion was just magic!! they didn’t care about the others they were in their own world and they couldn’t stop looking at each other !! that is what l call instant connection!!

here l just love the fact that sansa looking into jon’s eyes silently  to let him know that they have to do everything they can to take back their home was enough in that moment to make him say  yes !

this scene is just so perfect !! and there is so much to say about it !! sansa needed reassurance and jon gave it to her !!  l’ll make a post just for that scene because it deseves it!!


The most beautiful things in jonsa’ scenes are not the things they say to each other but the things they don’t say… their silences and facial expressions that beautifully convey their feelings!!

tags: reposting cuz i think it's gone
caption: jonerys paralells ♥

summary: The J0nsa fandom is full of bullies. I don't know if they just bully me or others. But they bully. I've been blocked, called...
body:
This is gonna hurt people but I’m goin’ to say it.

The J0nsa fandom is full of bullies. I don’t know if they just bully me or others. But they bully. I’ve been blocked, called stupid, made fun of for my views on things, called things I not am.

And the J0nerys fandom… I love you Bridget (My cousin), but your side of the fandom also bully. They call people retards & other names I’m not gonna get into. But let’s just say sometimes I wanna scream into the void.

I’ve debated saying Daenerys is not a hero with proof for over a year, I’ve talked about how a family bush can make you go insane. I’ve shown examples from history. But no one cares.

I don’t get asks about my sources and how I know all this. I get yelled at. I get called names. I get called stupid because I’m anti-Black Lives Matter (A TERROR GROUP), and that I want to save lives of babies and that I’m not a feminist.

Feminism died, when someone dyed their hair red and took a gender studies class.

And all of you liars and backstabers. Who block me for no reason. Is it because I have bipolar? maybe. Is it because I hate my life? maybe.

I’ve hated my life since 8th grade. I’m a high school dropout. I’m overweight, I like musical theatre, I write fanfiction about Chuck Bass.

I just … do you want me to change my views???

Cause as an INFP I’m stuck in my ways. As a Ravenclaw I’ll never stop learning, or researching.

Hey, oh by the way, Communism sucks.

Jonsa & Jonerys shippers can suck my dick.

blog.name: winterfellchild
blog.title: The pack survives
blog.description:
"She (Daenerys) has the power to destroy, she can wipe out entire cities, and we
certainly see that in ‘Fire and Blood.’ We see the dragons wiping out 
entire armies, wiping out towns and cities, destroying them, but that 
doesn’t necessarily enable you to rule — it just enables you to destroy." GRRM

but really the funniest posts are the ones from people that said HBO showed Jonsa reunion 2.0 because it's not important
